name: International Conference on Medicinal Chemistry, Drug Discovery and Drug Delivery
content: We are glad to invite you for a International Conference on Medicinal Chemistry, Drug Discover and Drug Delivery which is to be held at Vancouver, Canada in the month of October 29-30, 2020 organized by PAGES Conferences. MedChem-2020 will help gain a better understanding of drug discovery, design, development and delivery process and examines the process of drug design over the last few decades emphasizing the changes, standardization and quality control processes which will further aid in carrying out research in the areas of novel drug discovery. It also brings latest advances in drug approvals and covers different aspects of theory, research and application on drug development.
